backend/main.mo: Defines types and in‑memory state for users, products, orders, coupons, referrals, and includes admin‑gated sample product migration.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark design tokens and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation outlining features, tech stack, and local development setup steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, theme provider, and i18n wrapper, defining all user and admin routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin UI component showing Stripe configuration status using a query hook.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Renders a looping carousel of homepage banner images.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Displays a grid of categories with loading states and navigation to filtered catalog views.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, footer, and handles Internet Identity initialization state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with copyright text and a referral link to caffeine.ai. Includes dynamic year and encoded hostname.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the main header with navigation, search, user auth handling, theme/language toggles, and cart count. Uses various hooks for identity, cart, and admin checks.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Provides reusable skeleton loaders for product cards, grids, categories, and order rows.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays a product card with image, price, stock status, and add‑to‑cart button. Handles login checks and cart mutation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Shows a product image with fallback and error handling. Defaults to a placeholder if the URL is missing or fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines reusable React Query keys for products, cart, orders, and other backend data. Provides helpers for parameterized keys.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch caller user role and admin status from the backend. Uses actor-based queries with optional token-based admin validation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Hooks for fetching and mutating cart and wishlist data. Supports adding items to cart and auto‑invalidates affected queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Queries products and categories and triggers sample-product migration if the list is empty. Supports filtering and category fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all coupons from the backend using React Query. Enabled only when actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all customer orders or a single order with polling. Requires authenticated identity for customer queries.
Retrieves referral user IDs for the logged‑in user. Query key includes the user's principal.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Checks if Stripe is configured on the backend via a simple boolean query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, including access control initialization. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, status tracking, and identity restoration. Wraps AuthClient with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Thin wrapper around next-themes exposing theme, setter, and dark-mode flag.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Provides translation context and English/Hindi string dictionaries for UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page listing total categories with a simple loading state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Admin page showing available coupons count with loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing basic metrics like orders, revenue, and product count.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin layout handling authentication, token validation, navigation, and sidebar menu rendering.
Admin login form handling authentication, error display, and token storage.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page placeholder indicating upcoming order management features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page with search, sorting, and product table display.
Admin page placeholder for future user management features.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user’s cart, calculates subtotal, and provides a checkout navigation flow.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Implements product catalog with filters, sorting, search syncing, and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including payment selection, order summary, and simulated order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders homepage with banners, categories, and a featured products section.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows confirmation details for a completed order with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Displays the logged‑in user's orders with loading, empty, and list states, allowing navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Shows detailed information for a specific order, including status, date, total, and item list, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success message with options to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed product info, stock status, and actions for adding to cart or wishlist.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page rendering a card indicating that address management is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Profile section layout with tabs for overview, addresses, and settings, gated behind user authentication.
Provides UI to change theme (dark/light) and app language using select and switch controls.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays the user's wishlist or prompts login, showing products or an empty state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, containers, animations, plugins, and extended styling tokens.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features with versions.
